tasks.title: Comprehensive test Hero1 component
tasks.description: Use Playwriter MCP on localhost:3000/pages/create: Add Hero1 to canvas, edit title text, edit description, toggle LTR/RTL layout (verify image position changes), click Button 1 in canvas, edit button text, switch to Mobile view (verify stacked layout), delete component. Skip image testing. Fix any bugs found.
